hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 4

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Hookshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #4# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Have you thought about going where the items are?^Just saying.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Whispering Walls Left Pot 1

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Ice Arrows#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Twenty-three is number one!^And thirty-one is number two!

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
